• Dinner at a nice Italian restaurant with old friends.
  • Late night swim in a really warm pool throwing beach balls at each other.
  • Buying a new lens for the camera.
  • Buying a six pack of Beck's.
  • City Wide Worship and Prayer.
  • Gracie's with more good friends and beer.
  • Fantastic church service (in a family's basement!) and just talking about spirituality.
  • Lunch on the deck with the fam and a couple from church.
  • Buying junk food for myself.
  • Having one of my favorite homemade dinners.
  • A very nice evening.

Yeah.. it was one of the best weekends I’ve had in awhile.
